message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a decent share, but don't expect me to go easy on you.
I think we can do better than that. I'm proposing a more even split. Let's see if you're willing to be a bit more fair.
Your offer is a bit better, but I'm not giving up that much. I'll make a counteroffer.
I'm not getting any younger, and I need a bigger share to secure my future. Meet me in the middle, or we'll be back to square one.
